text: Bigu ej Pajomʙar, dar cavoʙi inkorason: Agar dar rui zamin ʙa coi insonho faristagon mezistand va ʙo poji xud misli insonho ʙa oromi roh meraftand, ʙarojason ʙa pajomʙari faristae az osmon nozil mekardem, vale ahli rui zamin ʙasarand, pas sazovor ast, ki pajomʙar az cinsi ʙasar ʙosad, to suxanasro ʙifahmand
